question: Who won the 2018 WTA Auckland Open Tennis title recently?
explanation: Julia Goerges won the WTA Auckland Open Tennis title, in Auckland, New Zealand. Germany's Julia Goerges defeated Denmark's Caroline Wozniacki 6-4, 7-6 (4) in the finals of the WTA Auckland Open Tennis. Julia Goerges won the Auckland singles title. Julia Goerges has won the Auckland singles title for the first time. This was her ninth attempt to win the title.
